appDesc.message: Okurken ve yazarken dünyanın en isabetli çevirilerini sağlayan DeepL Çeviri ile tercüme et.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

context_menus_translate_section.description: The right click context menu action to trigger an inline translation

default_popup_button_done.description: Button to close the default popup of the extension (settings)

error_message_generic_error.message: Sorry, we couldn't translate your text. Please try again later.
error_message_generic_error.description: Genric error to tell the user that there is a technical problem

error_message_internet_connection.message: Sorry, there’s an issue with the internet connection. Please try again.

error_message_please_login.message: Please log in again to translate this text.

error_message_quota_has_been_reached.message: You've reached your account usage limit.
error_message_quota_has_been_reached.description: There is an API error when the user reaches his quota and therefore is not longer able to use the pro endpoint and if does not get logged out he can not longer use the extension. We need to show him a message so the user knows why he logged out

error_message_session_expired.message: Sorry, your session expired. Please log in again.

error_message_technical_issue.message: Sorry, we couldn’t translate your text due to a known technical issue. We are working to fix this issue in the near future.

error_message_too_many_requests.message: Sorry, we couldn't translate your text. It appears that your network is sending too many requests to our servers.
error_message_too_many_requests.description: Info for free users that too many requests are triggered

extension_settings_keyboard_shortcut_per.description: This text will be displayed in the settings screen of the browser (we can only set the label here).

full_page_translation_auto_translate.message: Automatically translate pages into this language

full_page_translation_error_exceeds_char.message: Sorry, we can’t translate this page because it exceeds the character limit.
full_page_translation_error_exceeds_char.description: If a single element of the website has more than 5,500 characters, we can't translate it. And in that case there is nothing the user can do.

full_page_translation_error_service_not_.message: Sorry, full-page translations are currently unavailable. We are working to fix this as soon as possible.

full_page_translation_info_google_transl.message: It looks like you’re also using Google Translate. Please disable it so that our extension can work properly.

full_page_translation_no_translate_lang_.message: You’ve chosen not to translate from:

full_page_translation_no_website_data.message: We couldn’t get any data from this website. If possible, please reload the page.

full_page_translation_settings_done_butt.description: Done button for the settings page

full_page_translation_settings_subheader.description:
Translate pages sub-header label

inline_gdocs_max_chars_exceeded_body.message: Select less text, or enjoy unlimited translation with DeepL Pro.

inline_gdocs_max_chars_exceeded_title.message: As a free user, you can translate up to 5000 characters at a time

inline_translation_link_more_settings.description: Link that opens a more detailed settings page for translating while reading.

inline_translation_setting_label_title.description: Title of the setting page for enabling or disabling translation while reading.

inline_translation_setting_link_cancel.description: Link that cancels the changes by redirecting the user back.

inline_translation_setting_radio_disable.description: Radio button option to disable translation while reading everywhere
Radio button option to disable translation while reading only on the current website

inline_translation_settings_headline.description: Headline for settings section of the inline translation

inline_translation_settings_target_langu.description: Label for selecting the target language for inline translation. Most often this is the user's native language.

inline_translation_show_more.description: Text for a link that opens deepl in a new tab where the selected text is prefilled

input_translation_button_translate.description: Button in the settings screen of the input translation to trigger a translation

input_translation_highlighter_tooltip_te.message: Translate your own words with one click—right here!

input_translation_option_choose_language.description: If the user selects this option, each click on the button opens a selection to choose the target language

input_translation_option_default_transla.message: By default translate to this language
input_translation_option_default_transla.description: If the user selects this option, each button click immediately triggers a translation into the selected target languages

input_translation_setting_button_ok.description: button for saving the changes done by the user.

input_translation_setting_label_title.description: Title of the setting page for enabling or disabling translation while writing.

input_translation_setting_link_cancel.description: Link that cancels the changes by redirecting the user back.

input_translation_settings_headline.description: Headline for settings section of the translation of user input

input_translation_settings_target_langua.description: Label for selecting the target language for input translation.

input_translation_tooltip_settings.description: Tooltip to inform the user the button click open the settings for the input translation

input_translation_tooltip_translate.description: Tooltip to inform the user the button click will trigger a translation of the written text

input_translation_tooltip_translate_to_u.description: Tooltip to inform the user that he/she must select a target language

ui_share_success.description:
A button to share the link of the Chrome extension to my friends

If I click on that button:
- The link to the Chrome Store is copied into the clipboard
- A message is sent to the user confirming this and letting them know that they can share that link with their friends.
